QuestData.Title: Questionable Offerings
QuestData.Description:
So the traders sent you? As I told them, I only discuss the happenings of our family with those who understand our cause.
If you wish to know his whereabouts, you must prove that you do.
Behind us are several items gathered for offering to the Wicker Man. Bring us the items you feel will most appease it, so that it might give us its blessing.
Choose the correct offerings, and we will know your intent.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the correct offerings to the Wicker Man in Autumnvale.
QuestData.CompletionText: You must bring the correct offerings if you wish to show us your understanding.
QuestData.RewardText:
Your offerings pleased the Wicker Man.
Very well, ask your questions, $c.
